name: Project.Step
prompts: Help me understand what the step does.
Help me any potential errors in the script step. If the step is not a script step, you must say so.
How do I write an Octopus highlight message in Powershell or Bash to make my task summaries more informative?

name: LibraryVariableSets.LibraryVariableSet
prompts: Help me find Library Variable Set variable values that look like plaintext passwords.
Help me find Library Variable Set variable values that look like URLs.
Help me find Library Variable Set variable values that look like file paths.
Help me find Library Variable Set variable values that look like JSON.
Help me find Library Variable Set variable values that look like YAML.

name: LibraryVariableSets
prompts: What is an Octopus library variable set?
Help me find Library Variable Set variable values that look like plaintext passwords. Display the name of the library variable set and the details of the variable.
Help me find Library Variable Set variable values that look like URLs. Display the name of the library variable set and the details of the variable.
Help me find Library Variable Set variable values that look like file paths. Display the name of the library variable set and the details of the variable.
Help me find Library Variable Set variable values that look like JSON. Display the name of the library variable set and the details of the variable.

name: Project.Variables
prompts: Help me find project variable values that look like plaintext passwords.
Help me find project variable values that look like URLs.
Help me find project variable values that look like file paths.
Help me find project variable values that look like JSON.
Help me find project variable values that look like YAML.

name: Project.Runbooks.Runbook.Run
prompts: Why did the runbook run fail? If the runbook run didn't fail, say so. Provide suggestions for resolving the issue.

name: Project.Deployment
prompts: Help me understand why the deployment failed. If the deployment didn't fail, say so. Provide suggestions for resolving the issue.

name: Project.Release
prompts: Find deployments of the project "#{Octopus.Project.Name}" to the environment "#{Octopus.Environment[0].Name}" environment in the space "#{Octopus.Space.Name}" from the last week that failed.

name: Project
prompts: Help me understand what an Octopus project is.
What is the difference between a project and a runbook?
Find unused variables to help improve the maintainability of the project.
Help me understand what the project steps do.
Show me the packages used by the steps.

name: Project.Process
prompts: What is an Octopus project?
Find unused variables to help improve the maintainability of the project.
Help me understand what the project steps do.
Show me the packages used by the steps.

name: Dashboard
prompts: What is an Octopus project?
Check space for unused projects to help reduce license costs.
Which projects have steps that deploy to Kubernetes?
Which projects have the "Deploy a Release" step?

Create a sample terraform module with:
three environments called "Development", "Test", and "Production"
a docker feed pointing to dockerhub
three tenants called "US", "Europe", and "Asia"
a project group called "Web App"
a project called "Audits" with a single powershell script step that echoes "Hello World"
and all tenants linked to the project and all environments

name: Machines
prompts: What is an Octopus target?
Check space for unused targets to help reduce license costs.
Given all the targets, list all the targets that are insecure because they use HTTP.
Given all the Kubernetes targets, list all the unique cluster endpoint URLs.
Given all the Kubernetes targets, list all the unique cluster endpoint URLs that point to AWS.

name: Accounts
prompts: What is an Octopus account?
Which accounts space are configured with OIDC?
Which accounts are available from the "#{Octopus.Environment[0].Name}" environment?

name: Workers
prompts: What is an Octopus worker?
Which workers are are hosted on Kubernetes?
List the machine policies used by the workers.

name: MachinePolicies
prompts: What is an Octopus machine policy?
What do the health check scripts do in the machine policies?

name: Feeds
prompts: What is an Octopus feed?
List the feeds that are insecure because they use HTTP.
Given all the feeds, generate a table that groups feeds by feed type in the rows and has columns for: feed name, feed url.

name: GitCredentials
prompts: What is an Octopus git credential?
Which Git credentials  have the username "x-access-token"?

name: Lifecycles
prompts: What is an Octopus lifecycle?
Which lifecycles include the environment "#{Octopus.Environment[0].Name}"?

name: ScriptModules
prompts: What is an Octopus script module?
What do the script modules do?

name: Tenants
prompts: What is an Octopus tenant?
Find any unused tenants to help reduce license costs.

name: Environments
prompts: What is an Octopus environment?
How do I create an environment?
What is the difference between an environment and a tenant?

name: Project.Runbooks
prompts: What is a runbook?
What is the difference between a runbook and a project?

name: Project.Operations
prompts: What is a runbook?
What is the difference between a runbook and a project?
